name: Mahjong City
description:
This is the Mahjong you know and love with loads of extra features! Solve Mahjong puzzles to earn stars, and gems. Use the currency to purchase buildings on your own land to help make items to help with your Mahjong adventures. You can unlock many cities with new and more challenging Mahjong puzzles to complete. The more you solve the better you city will become!

There's a seemingly endless amount of cities & Mahjong puzzles to complete! Come join in the fun! It's 100% free to play!

Features:
- Lots of Levels
- Boosters to help with Mahjong
- Build your own city
- Unlock cities to play new Mahjong challenges in
- World Map full of cool adventures
- Many different backgrounds and Mahjong tiles to choose from
- Play for free!
